items.title: Bring Carl, Russel, and Dug home with this LEGO Disney & Pixar ‘Up’ House set at $30
items.summary:
Lego Disney and Pixar ‘Up’ House set

Buy for $30.50 (Reg. $38.50)

What we love

Enjoy the magic of Disney and Pixar’s “Up” with this brick-built recreation of the title character: the house! Of course, the fun can’t be had with just the balloon-flying abode, with the set also coming with minifigures of Carl Fredricksen and Russell – plus, everyone’s favorite squirrel-obsessed fur baby, Dug. You can relive the memories of the film or create new ones, all filled with the whimsy of the hit animated movie.
